48216 Hofgeismar Agent: Guten Morgen Galina Henk, bitte warten Sie einen Moment, während ich Ihre Bestelldetails abrufe. Kunde: Nachdem ich jeden Tag mehrmals das Versanddatum meines Gutknecht Henschel GbR checke und mir zugesichert wurde, dass sich dieses nun nicht mehr verschieben wird, hat es sich heute vormittag dennoch wieder um eine Woche nach hinten auf den 16.2.119476196 geschoben. Kunde: Bestellt und bezahlt wurde es vor über einem halben Jahr. Kunde: Ich kann das so nicht mehr akzeptieren. Agent: Wie kann ich Ihnen bei dieser Bestellung helfen? Kunde: Nachdem ich jeden Tag mehrmals das Versanddatum meines Haring Sofas checke und mir zugesichert wurde, dass sich dieses nun nicht mehr verschieben wird, hat es sich heute vormittag dennoch wieder um eine Woche nach hinten auf den 16.2.119476196 geschoben. Kunde: Bestellt und bezahlt wurde es vor über einem halben Jahr. Kunde: Ich kann das so nicht mehr akzeptieren. Agent: Die Lieferverzögerung Ihrer Bestellung tut mir leid. Agent: Wir stehen vor globalen Herausforderungen bei der Herstellung und dem Versand, aber wir arbeiten hart daran, Artikel so schnell wie möglich zu unseren Kunden zu bringen. Agent: Wenn Sie mit Ihrer Bestellung noch erhalten möchten, prüfen wir gerne die mögliche Entschädigung, sobald der Artikel geliefert wurde. Kunde: Ich habe absolut Verständnis für Verzögerungen in der aktuellen Zeit. Kunde: Aber über 6 Monate ist inakzeptabel. Kunde: Mir wurde der Versand spätestens im Januar zugesichert und nun schiebt es sich im Februar ebenfalls immer weiter nach hinten. Kunde: Ich bitte Sie nun nach über einem halben Jahr etwas zu unternehmen. Agent: Die Lieferverzögerung beträgt etwas mehr als 2 Monate. Das voraussichtliche Versanddatum, als die Bestellung aufgegeben wurde, war der 28. Oktober. Kunde: Macht es das besser? Kunde: Dann sind es dennoch über 3 monate. Kunde: Und die Bestellung wurde am 3. August 119476196 getätigt. Agent: Ja, es wurde um 3 Monate nach hinten verschoben, entsprechend dem aktuellen Versanddatum. Agent: Obwohl diese Ereignisse außerhalb unserer Kontrolle liegen, verstehen wir, wie frustrierend dies für Sie ist, und es tut uns sehr leid. Agent: Sobald Ihre Bestellung geliefert wurde, prüfen wir sicherlich, ob eine Entschädigung möglich ist. Kunde: Ich hätte einfach nur gerne irgendwann mein Sofa. Kunde: Wann kommt es denn nun? Kunde: Wird es sich noch in den März oder April verschieben? Agent: Ich verstehe. Agent: Das aktuelle Versanddatum ist der 16. Februar. Agent: Wir können dies nicht garantieren, aber hoffentlich können wir diesen Termin einhalten. Agent: Kann ich heute sonst noch etwas für Sie tun? Kunde: Nein danke
en:
Customer: Order number: 119476196 Customer:  Galina Henk Customer: Weinholdgasse 0
48216 Hofgeismar Customer: Weinholdgasse 0
48216 Hofgeismar Agent: Good Morning Galina Henk, please allow me a moment to retrieve your order details Customer: After checking the shipping date of my Gutknecht Henschel GbR several times a day and being assured that it will no longer be postponed, this morning it was pushed back to the 16.2.119476196 again by a week. Customer: It was ordered and paid more than half a year ago. Customer: I can no longer accept that. Agent: How can I help with this order please? Customer: After checking the shipping date of my Haring sofa several times a day and being assured that it will no longer be postponed, this morning it was pushed back to the 16.2.119476196 again by a week. Customer: It was ordered and paid more than half a year ago. Customer: I can no longer accept that. Agent: I'm sorry for the delay  you are experiencing with your order. Agent: We are facing global manufacturing and shipping challenges but we are working hard to get items to our customers as quickly as possible. Agent: If you would like to continue with your order we will be happy to look at compensation once the item has been delivered. Customer: I absolutely understand delays in the current time. Customer: But more than 6 months is unacceptable. Customer: I was promised the shipment by January at the latest and now it is being delayed well into February. Customer: I want to ask you to do something after more than half a year. Agent: The delay is just over 2 months - the estimated dispatch date when the order was placed was October 28. Customer: Does that make it better? Customer: Then it's still over 3 months. Customer: And the order was made on the 3rd of August 119476196. Agent: Yes it will have been pushed back 3 months according to the current dispatch date. Agent: Although these events are out of our control we do understand how frustrating this is for you and we are very sorry. Agent: Once your order journey has completed we will certainly look at compensation. Customer: I would just like to have my sofa sometime. Customer: When does it arrive? Customer: Will it be postponed to March or April? Agent: I understand. Agent: The current dispatch date is February 16. Agent: We cannot guarantee this but hopefully we will be able to meet this target. Agent: Is there anything else I can help you with today please? Customer: No, thanks.

Agent: Gern geschehen! Gibt es noch etwas, bei dem ich heute helfen kann? Kunde: Nein, danke. Kunde: Einen schönen Tag Ihnen Agent: Vielen Dank, einen schönen Tag noch! en:
Customer: Hello, Customer: I would like to order 2 fabric samples. Customer: However, what is wrong with the phone number? Customer: I have already tried so many different formats. Customer: +49(0)0557 85823 should be right, right? Agent: Good Morning Univ.Prof. Vito Hiller B.A., thank you for getting in contact with http://hein.de/, you're through to Univ.Prof. Vito Hiller B.A. Customer: Hello Univ.Prof. Vito Hiller B.A., Customer: How can I enter the phone number Customer: correctly? Agent: Let me have a look into this for you, you're placing the order for delivery to Germany? Customer: No, to Austria. Agent: Thank you, one moment please Agent: I have found this, when adding the product to the basket & checking out you need to change the phone number section to Austria as this automatically shows as Germany Agent: Once you have done this it will allow you to proceed :) Customer: But how can I change it to Austria? Customer: As a country I have already selected Austria. Agent: Are you on the Austrian website? Customer: I was at http://hein.de/ and entered Austria. Customer: Yes, I think so... Agent: http://hein.de/ Agent: This is the website you need, if it diverts you to the UK site you will be able to click the flag in the top right corner and change to AT which will be for Austria :) Customer: Here I am!! Customer: Is there another way to order the fabric samples? Customer: By phone or by email? Customer: That takes too long and is too technical. Agent: http://hein.de/ Agent: This is our page for fabric samples, if there is something on here which you don't see available then you can let us know and we can look into this for you to see if we have this :) Customer: I see it all. Customer: I am yes, but the input of the telephone number does not work and therefore I can also not order it. Agent: The telephone number section needs to be changed to Austria for the order to be placed :) if you are unable to do this then please let me know which fabric samples you require and I can place this order for you Customer: That would be great. Customer: I would like the fabric pattern for Davids and Pigeon Grey. Customer: And if it is available, forest green as well, but I cannot choose this. Customer: Maybe it is not available as a fabric pattern? Agent: Let me have a look for you :) Agent: At the minute we do not have the forest green fabric sample, however, I am able to order the other two for you, could you confirm the name to send these to, the address, email address and telephone number please? Customer: Yes gladly: Hübelstraße 056
93535 Bernburg, anne-katrin25@eimer.com, +49(0)0557 85823 Agent: The fabric samples have been ordered for you and should be received within 7-10 working days :) Customer: Thank you so much! Agent: You're very welcome, is there anything else I can help with today? Customer: No, thank you. Customer: A beautiful day to you. Agent: Thank you, have a wonderful day! Agent: Thank you for taking the time to talk with me today and I hope I have managed to resolve your query, if you wouldn't mind rating our chat today based on my customer service skills I would really appreciate it, the rating button can be found on this chat. Agent: I hope you have a great day and please come back to us if you need any further assistance.

en: Customer: Hello, Customer: I have a question. Customer: Is it possible to get the goods all in one day? Customer: And is it possible to get the furniture earlier than described? Customer: Kind regards, Customer: Nue Dina Scheibe Customer: Hi, Customer: Hi, Agent: Good afternoon Dina Scheibe Agent: Thanks for contacting Söding KG, you are through to Dina Scheibe Customer: Hello, Agent: Have you placed an order with us? Customer: I would like to leave a Customer: I have a few more questions. Agent: Of course Agent: So dispatch times are stated on the website and we could not expedite sooner Customer: Ok and can I have them delivered in one day? Agent: As in all the items on one day you mean? Agent: That can only happen if the couriers are the same, and then we can arrange a group delivery - if they are different couriers, then we could not guarantee this Customer: Söding KG, Darbygreen Customer: Söding KG, Darbygreen Customer: Söding KG, Darbygreen Customer: These are the 3 things I want to order. Agent: Okay, then these will be the same courier, so yes, it is possible to group the delivery Customer: Great. Customer: And when is the earliest possible date? Customer: Because I need them at the end of March. Agent: Okay, the dispatch times are stated on the website for the items, we could not guarantee this would be the end of March Customer: Well it says in 8-10 weeks and that would be march. Customer: We need to know that already because we need the furniture. Agent: Okay, so once the order is placed it will give you an approximate date for the dispatch Customer: I meant 10-12 weeks. Agent: You will also be able to group the delivery when you place the order Customer: Yes, anyway I just want to have it all at the end of March. Customer: Because one of the sofas would come later and whether it is possible that it all arrives at the same time. Customer: And the delivery is in Austria, that is no problem, right? Agent: Okay, then that should not be a problem, if one item is dispatching later then the group will be based on the latest date Customer: Since the company is not in Austria. Agent: We have an Austrian website so this is not a problem Customer: Ok. Customer: And where is the headquarters? Customer: And where are they being produced? Agent: They are manufactured overseas - and shipped - this is why the dispatch times are long on some items Customer: Ok. Customer: And where is the sofa being produced? Customer: In Germany. Agent: This will be China - they are manufactured Customer: Oh, I thought in Germany. Customer: And is the quality alright? Agent: Yes, the items are to order to a standard Customer: I asked something else. Agent: Sorry - I missed that? Customer: And is the quality alright? Agent: Yes, the items are  to order to a high standard Customer: What do they consist of? Agent: All the details of each item are available on the website for you Customer: Thank you for your help. Agent: You are very welcome

Kunde: sorry NO I mixed it up. Kunde: It is the wardrobe with Order number 2. Kunde: You have sent it on 5/1/ and I have not heard back Agent: Der Versand hat sich weltweit erheblich verzögert und die Häfen sind sehr betroffen davon. Agent: Ich gehe davon aus, da wir es seit einer Weile darauf gewartet, dass dies das aktuelle Problem mit dieser Sendung ist. Agent: Oh, okay, eine Minute bitte. Agent: Das Ullmann KG? Agent: Aufbewahrungsschrank? Kunde: was ist die frage? Agent: Ist das der Artikel? Agent: Der Aufbewahrungsschrank? Agent: Dies hat unser Lager am 5. Januar verlassen, um an Ullmann KG zu gehen. Agent: Ich weiß, dass sie mit einigen Verzögerungen zu tun haben. Agent: Sie können derzeit keine Artikel über 80 kg liefern, aber dieser Aufbewahrungsschrank wiegt 51 kg ohne Verpackung, daher sollte dies kein Problem sein. Kunde: exakt aber bis heute hat sich Ullmann KG NICHT gemeldet Agent: Ich kann sehen, dass es eine Sendungsnummer mit Ullmann KG gibt, aber Sie haben Recht, sie haben dies nicht als verfolgbar in ihrem Depot markiert. Agent: Ich werde dies mit dem Lagerteam untersuchen, um zu sehen, ob ich weitere Informationen erhalten kann. Agent: Dies kann nur auf Verzögerungen zurückzuführen sein, aber ich möchte nachsehen. Agent: Ich muss diese Anfrage an sie weiterleiten und werde später, heute oder morgen, eine Antwort erhalten. Agent: Ich kann aber sicherlich auch danach fragen. Kunde: Ja BITTE !! en:
Customer: This order was dispatched by you on January 5, and the delivery person has not contacted me to date (=21/1)! Customer: Order number 2 Agent: Good Morning Dr. Tanja Gnatz Agent: Thanks for contacting Ullmann KG, you are through to Dr. Tanja Gnatz. Agent: So that I can assist you can you please provide your account details (Full Name, E-mail address, Postal Address) Customer: Dr. Tanja Gnatz Customer: wulffbabette@binner.de Customer: Trommlerstr. 29
45279 Pegnitz Customer: Trommlerstr. 29
45279 Pegnitz Customer: Welcome Agent: One minute then please Agent: Is this the Ullmann KG Couchtische you are concerned about? Customer: Yes. Agent: I'm very sorry - I can see this is a very long delay on this part of the order Agent: This is still not with us Customer: Sorry NO, I mixed it up. Customer: It is the wardrobe with order number 2. Customer: You have sent it on 5/1 and I have not heard back. Agent: There has been significant global disruption in shipping and ports are very congested. Agent: I would suggest given that we have expected it in fairly soon for a while, that this is the current issue with this consignment Agent: Oh, okay, one minute please Agent: The Ullmann KG? Agent: Hall storage? Customer: What is the question? Agent: Is this the article? Agent: The hallway storage? Agent: This left our warehouse on 5th January to pass to Ullmann KG Agent: I know they are having some delays with backlog. Agent: They are not able to deliver items over 80kg at present, but this hallway storage is 51kg before packaging, so this shouldn't be an issue. Customer: Exactly, but to this day Ullmann KG has NOT contacted me. Agent: I can see there is a tracking number with Ullmann KG, but you are right, they have not marked this as being tracked in to their depot. Agent: I will have a look into this with the warehouse team to see if I can get any more information. Agent: This may just be due to delays, but I want to check Agent: I will need to pass this query to them and will hear back later today or tomorrow Agent: Are you happy for me to email you with more information once I have it? Customer: Yes, please!! Agent: Okay, I will be bakc in touch as soon as I have this Customer: AND can you also check with regard to the Ullmann KG bed +49(0) 069693302 please? Customer: This has also already been sent. Customer: Hello? Agent: Sorry, I was looking at the order for the bed Agent: The bed is over the 80kg, so this cannot be delivered now until restrictions are lifted Agent: I am very sorry if this has not been communicated to you Customer: What kind of restriction and why? Customer: NO, it was not communicated. Customer: AND the bed has 4 parts, so the individual parts will maybe have less than 2 kg. Agent: I understand that - it is something I am querying at the minute as well with the warehouse directly, but for now it seems that these heavy items are not being delivered. Agent: I can certainly ask about this as well though Customer: Yes, PLEASE!! Agent: I can see the tracking was updated for this item, so it is possible it  will be delivered soon Agent: This was only dispatched last week so this is still the expected time frame Customer: Sounds good, but how accurate is this information? Agent: We can only go on the information provided by the courier. Agent: Items being held back due to weight are mostly being held with us so I would suggest if it is tracked in, then they have it and if it says it will be delivered, then this is true. Customer: Perfect. Customer: Then only the Ullmann KG remains as a question? Agent: Yes I will make enquiries and be back in touch Agent: Is there anythign else? Customer: Thank you very much. Customer: No, there is nothing more. Customer: That's already enough problems. Agent: It is very true! Customer: Bye and thanks. Agent: Stay well for now, I will email you Agent: Thank you for taking the time to talk with me today and I hope I have managed to resolve your query, if you wouldn't mind rating our chat today based on my customer service skills I would really appreciate it, the rating button can be found on this chat. Agent: I hope you have a great day and please come back to us if you need any further assistance.

Kunde: Guten Tag, Kunde: ich habe gestern bei Testpilot eine Bewertung abgegeben und von https://www.haenel.com/ daraufhin eine Antwort erhalten:                                                Hallo Erna Zorbach, Kunde: vielen Dank, dass Sie sich die Zeit für eine Rückmeldung genommen haben. Kunde: Es tut uns leid zu hören, dass Ihre Bestellung von einer Blockade beim belgischen Zoll betroffen ist und dass Sie keine genauen Informationen dazu erhalten haben. Kunde: Leider sind einige betroffene Produkte auf unbestimmte Zeit blockiert und die Bestellungen wurden daher auf den nächsten Produktionszyklus verschoben. 22587 Bad Kreuznach Agent: Guten Morgen Erna Zorbach, Agent: vielen Dank, dass Sie sich mit Noack Ullmann KG in Verbindung gesetzt haben. Ich bin Erna Zorbach. Agent: Lassen Sie mich das für Sie untersuchen. Agent: Okay, der Noack Ullmann KG, Eiche und Weiß? Kunde: Genau :) Agent: Vielen Dank! Agent: Der voraussichtliche Versand wird jetzt am 06. Mai 2021 erfolgen. Agent: Es gibt derzeit viel Druck auf den globalen Versand auf der ganzen Welt. Agent: Infolgedessen dauert es länger, bis unsere Produkte ankommen. Agent: Dies bedeutet leider, dass sich Ihr Versanddatum erneut ändern kann oder bei Ihrer Bestellung erneut eine Verzögerung auftritt. Agent: Wenn Sie die Bestellung beibehalten möchten, bitten wir Sie, sich wieder mit uns in Verbindung zu setzen, sobald sie geliefert wurde, damit wir die volle Verzögerung und Ihre Kundenerfahrung insgesamt bewerten können. Agent: Wenn es eine Verzögerung von mehr als 14 Tage gibt, werden wir Ihnen gerne eine Entschädigung anbieten, um uns für die Verzögerung zu entschuldigen. Agent: Wenn Sie es natürlich vorziehen, nicht länger zu warten, können Sie Ihre Bestellung jederzeit für eine volle Rückerstattung vor der Lieferung stornieren. en:
Customer: Good day. Customer: I submitted a review on Testpilot yesterday and then received a response from https://www.haenel.com/: Hello Erna Zorbach, Customer: Thank you for taking the time to respond. Customer: We are sorry to hear that your order is affected by a blockade at Belgian customs and that you have not received any precise information about it. Customer: Unfortunately, some affected products are blocked indefinitely and orders have therefore been postponed to the next production cycle. Customer: Of course, you can contact our customer service for a compensation. Customer: We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. Customer: Best regards, Customer: Your https://www.haenel.com/ Team. Now I am getting in touch with you regarding the "compensation" that was offered to me. Customer: Thank you. Customer: My order number 893281250 Customer: Erna Zorbach Customer: jeanettehofmann@gmail.com Customer: Schäferweg 703
22587 Bad Kreuznach Agent: Good Morning Erna Zorbach Agent: Thanks for contacting Noack Ullmann KG, you are through to Erna Zorbach Agent: Let me just look into this for you Agent: Okay so the Noack Ullmann KG, Eiche und Weiß? Customer: Exactly. :) Agent: Thank you. Agent: Regrettably your order has been delayed whilst shipping to us from the manufacturer which is why your dispatch date has changed. Agent: The expected dispatch is now showing as 06-May-2021 Agent: There’s currently a lot of pressure on global shipping around the world. Agent: As a result, our products are taking longer to arrive into ports. Agent: This does unfortunately mean that your dispatch date may change again, or your order could be delayed further. Agent: I understand that this will be disappointing, but please rest assured that we are doing all we can to get your order to you as quickly as possible. Agent: If you are happy to continue with the order, we ask that you get back in touch once it has been delivered so we can review the full delay and your customer journey as a whole. Agent: If the delay remains at over 14 days we will happily offer a good will gesture to apologise for the delay. Agent: Of course, if you would prefer to not wait any longer, you can cancel your order for a full refund at any time before delivery Customer: OK, thanks. Agent: You are very welcome Customer: Have a nice day ahead.

Customer: I have already uploaded them! Customer: Did you get the pictures? Agent: Have you sent them in a previous chat? Customer: No, here in the chat. Customer: Did you get them now? Agent: I am sorry they haven't come through, I can email you and you can respond to the email? Customer: Yes, please! Agent: I have just sent a generic photo request for you to reply to with the photos. Customer: Email is sent out. Agent: I have sent the email to the one on your account, I am sorry there isn't a reply in my inbox yet. Customer: So, now everything should be there. Customer: The sending confirmation just came. Customer: Sorry. Agent: Got them, thank you. Agent: The draws are still useable? Customer: Draws? Customer: What do you mean? Agent: Is the item still functional? Agent: Would they be safe to keep? Customer: All drawers work, only optical defects. Customer: All drawers work, only optical defects. Agent: Could you please confirm the full name on the account and the shipping address? Customer: David Jessel Customer: Schäferweg 8/6
17320 Wittmund Customer: Schäferweg 8/6
17320 Wittmund,  Agent: Thank you, I can offer a 75.00 euro voucher or a 50.00 euro partial refund to keep the item as it is. Agent: You do of course have the option to return it. Agent: I am unable to offer a replacement because it is no longer in stock. Customer: We would like to keep the chest, but would like to have a discount for the damage. Customer: The waiting time plus shipping and re-shipping is too time-consuming for us. Customer: We could live with the situation for a €100 coupon and would immediately agree. Agent: Okay I can make you a 49972 euro coupon and will email the code as soon as it is activated. Customer: Great. Customer: Thank you very much for the quick help. Agent: Is there anything else you need? Customer: No, otherwise everything is okay. Customer: Thank you. en: Customer: When will my order arrive? Customer: 842322 Agent: Good Morning Dipl.-Ing. Wieland Preiß Agent: Thanks for contacting Gerlach GmbH, you are through to Dipl.-Ing. Wieland Preiß Agent: So that I can assist you can you please provide your account details (Full Name, E-mail address, Postal Address and Order Number) Customer: Dipl.-Ing. Wieland Preiß, thank you for waiting. Agent: regrettably, the order is not in your name, so I am unable to deal with this for you. Agent: Please get the account holder to be in touch, or to give authorisation to speak with you Agent: I can email you if you like Customer: You are welcome to call me. Agent: Yes, he would need to respond back to the email, with the email address on the account please Customer: Ok. Customer: E-mail sent? Agent: Yes Customer: Nothing has arrived. Agent: It takes time to come through - it has been sent Customer: The mail has arrived on my account. Customer: And I also own the account from which the payment was made. Customer: And now? Agent: Please ask the account holder to respond back to the email Customer: I've just done that. Agent: I need the account holder to email back to me Customer: I am the account holder. Customer: How can it be so complicated? Agent: Your husband is the account holder - you have already said that Customer: Yes, but I'm also an account holder, it's a shared account. Agent: I need the account holder to email back, no this order is not in your name Customer: I just want to know when the order will arrive. Customer: kornelia08@hotmail.de Agent: Yes, I understand this but I will need Dipl.-Ing. Wieland Preiß to email to state as the account holder, he is happy for me to speak with you. Agent: It is the law

Agent: Die Bilder der Produkte auf unserer Website dienen nur zur Veranschaulichung. Kunde: Wenn ich morgen die andere Kommode stornieren möchte Agent: Ja, jeder von uns kann diese Informationen sehen, aber lassen Sie es uns einfach wissen und wir können diese für Sie stornieren. Agent: Vielen Dank, dass Sie sich heute die Zeit genommen haben, mit mir zu sprechen, und ich hoffe, ich habe es geschafft, Ihre Frage zu lösen. Agent: Ich werde den Chat jetzt beenden, aber klicken Sie einfach auf die Schaltfläche, wenn Sie weitere Fragen haben sollten. Agent: Sie erhalten in Kürze eine E-Mail, um unseren Chat heute zu bewerten. Agent: Wenn Sie einen Moment Zeit haben, darf ich Sie bitten, dies auszufüllen, ansonsten danke ich Ihnen nochmals und wünsche Ihnen einen schönen Tag.

Customer: The delivered sideboard Fritsch is unfortunately sooo much darker than shown on your homepage (I sent photos in the email). Hans-Joachim Mude, I do not have any email from you with photos? Agent: where did you send them Customer: I sent you an email under "Contact us." Agent: Thank you - regrettably we cannot guarantee the colours, we state that on our website, due to the lighting they can vary slightly Agent: 4.1 The images of the Products on our site are for illustrative purposes only. Agent: Although we have every effort to display the colours accurately, we cannot guarantee that your computer will display the colours accurately or reflect the colour of the Products. Agent: The Products that are delivered to you may vary slightly from those images. Agent: This is on our website Agent: Would you like to send the item back? Customer: Some buyers have posted photos of the purchased sideboard. Customer: There you can also see such dark dressers. Customer: I thought, however, that those were older purchases from when the dresser was offered in other colors. Customer: Funny, that the buyers of the dresser could seemingly capture the exact color on the photos and you couldn't with a better technique? Customer: That is not a slight color difference, but a huge one!!! Customer: I feel misled by you. Customer: Can the product be returned for free? Agent: Yes, if you would like to return then I will arrange this for you Agent: Are you wanting to cancel the other part of your order? Customer: Do I understand you correctly that the return would be free of charge? Agent: Yes, I will honour free of charge as you are not happy Agent: Would you like me to arrange please Customer: How long can I cancel the other sideboard? Customer: Thank you very much for your contribution! Customer: How long can I let the return shipment go through my head? Agent: It is currently in a shipping status, once in a dispatch status we cannot cancel this Agent: Do you want to think about it or for me to cancel now? Customer: How long can I still think about this? Customer: I would like to think until tomorrow and then get in touch, is that possible? Agent: Yes, that is possible - tomorrow is fine Customer: Thank you! Customer: Another question: Can I have the skillful sideboard sent back in a different box than the original box? Kunde: Guten Tag Kunde: Ich würde gerne wissen wie lange ich noch auf meine Bestellung warten muss. Kunde: Nach über zwei Monaten habe ich nun vor ein paar Tagen eine E-Mail erhalten, darin steht, dass die Ware in kürze im Lager antrifft. Kunde: Wie lange heißt „in Kürze“ ? Kunde: Wann trifft die Ware bei euch ein? Kunde: Und wann wird sie dann mir zugeschickt? Kunde: Bestellnummer: 85 Kunde: Bitte um baldige Antwort. Kunde: Grüße, Klaus-Werner Birnbaum Agent: Guten Morgen Klaus-Werner Birnbaum, danke für Ihre Nachricht. Agent: Kann ich Ihre Bestellnummer, Lieferadresse und E-Mail-Adresse haben? Agent: Ich werde dann danach für Sie suchen können. Agent: Entschuldigung, ich meinte den vollständigen Namen, nicht die Bestellnummer. Kunde: Klaus-Werner Birnbaum Kunde: enaser@hotmail.de Kunde: Rädelring 8
58739 Wertingen,  Agent: Vielen Dank, der Artikel soll am 1. Februar versandt werden. Es gibt eine Lieferverzögerung für den Artikel. Agent: Wir können eine Entschädigung gewähren, sobald der Artikel bei Ihnen ist. Kunde: Was versteht man darunter? Agent: Der Artikel wird am 1. Februar versandt. Agent: Anschließend wird der Kurier Sie kontaktieren, um Sie über den Liefertermin zu informieren. Dies kann bis zu 7 Werktage nach dem Versand sein. Kunde: Ich wurde bereits auf die Zeit um den 18.01. Kunde: 21 vertröstet und jetzt sagen Sie mir am 01.02. soll der Artikel versandt werden!? Kunde: Wie verlässlich ist das noch? Kunde: Das habe ich verstanden aber was meinen Sie mit kompensieren? Kunde: I understood that, but what do you mean by compensate? Agent: Es tut mir leid, dass es eine Versandverzögerung gab. Agent: Sie können es über Ihr Konto stornieren, wenn Sie zu lange warten müssten. Agent: Dies ist das genaueste Datum, das wir haben. Kunde: So wie ich sie verstehe kann ich um den 01. Kunde: -08.02. mit dem Eintreffen frühestens rechnen. Kunde: Wie hoch soll die teilweise Rückerstattung sein, wenn ich den Artikel nicht umgehend storniere? Kunde: Expect it to arrive at the earliest. Kunde: How much should the partial refund be if I do not cancel the item immediately? Agent: Das ist die schnellste Lieferung. Kunde: Ich bin äußerst Unzufrieden, sowohl mit dieser Antwort als auch mit dem Service. Kunde: Hätte ich das gewusst, hätte ich nicht bei Ihnen bestellt. Kunde: Sie halten Ihre Kunden bei der Stange und versuchen Sie mit falschen Angaben UND mit falschen Versprechungen zu trösten. Kunde: Wenn Sie mir sagen, dass eine Entschädigung eingelöst wird, dann will ich wissen nach welchen Bewertungen dies erfolgt und mit welcher Summe ich rechnen kann. Kunde: Das würde nämlich meine Entscheidung beeinflussen, ob ich storniere oder nicht! Kunde: If you tell me that a compensation will be redeemed, I want to know according to what evaluations this will be done and what amount I can count on. Kunde: That would affect my decision whether to cancel or not! Agent: Es tut mir leid, wir können nur eine Entschädigung gewähren, wenn wir warten, bis Sie den Artikel erhalten haben und damit zufrieden sind. Agent: Wir bewerten die Länge der Verzögerung und die gesamte Kundenerfahrung. Deshalb warten wir, bis die Lieferung abgeschlossen ist.
en:
Customer: Good day. Customer: I would like to know how long I still have to wait for my order. Customer: After more than two months, I now received an e-mail a few days ago, stating that the goods will arrive in the warehouse shortly. Customer: How long is "shortly"? Customer: When will you receive the merchandise? Customer: And when will it be sent to me? Customer: Order number: 85 Customer: Please reply as soon as possible. Customer: Greetings, Klaus-Werner Birnbaum Agent: Good morning Klaus-Werner Birnbaum, thank you for your message. Agent: Can I have your order number, shipping address and email address? Agent: I will then be able to check for you. Agent: Sorry I meant full name, not order number. Customer: Klaus-Werner Birnbaum Customer: enaser@hotmail.de Customer: Rädelring 8
58739 Wertingen, Agent: Thank you, the item is due to dispatch 1st February, the item experienced a delay. Agent: We can compensate for this once the item is with you. Customer: What does this mean? Agent: The item will dispatch 1st February. Agent: From there the courier will contact you to inform you of the delivery date, this can be up to 7 working days after dispatch. Customer: I have already been put off to the time around 18/01/21, Customer: and now you tell me the item will be sent on 01/02!? Customer: How reliable can that still be? Customer: I understood that, but what do you mean by compensate? Customer: I understood that, but what do you mean by compensating? Agent: I am sorry the delay occurred in the shipping. Agent: You can cancel via your account if he wait is too long. Agent: this is the most accurate date we have. Customer: As far as I understand you, I can expect it to arrive around Customer: 01/ - 08/02 at the earliest. Customer: How much would the partial refund be if I don't cancel the item immediately? Customer: Expect to arrive at the earliest. Customer: How much should the partial refund be if I do not cancel the article immediately? Agent: You have the quickest batch. Customer: I am extremely dissatisfied, both with this answer and with the service. Customer: If I had known that, I would not have ordered from you. Customer: You keep your customers in line and try to comfort them with false claims AND with false promises. Customer: If you tell me that a compensation will be granted, I want to know according to what ratings this will be done and what amount I can expect. Customer: Because that would influence my decision whether or not I will cancel! Customer: If you tell me that compensation will be redeemed, then I want to know which evaluations this takes place and which sum I can count on. Customer: That would affect my decision whether to cancel or not! Agent: I am sorry, because we can only compensate once we wait till you have the item and are happy with it. Agent: We assess the length of delay, customer experience and the customer journey as a whole, that's why we wait till it is complete.

Agent: Leider haben wir keine Ersatzteile wie Knöpfe, die für den Verkauf verfügbar sind. Agent: Es tut mir sehr leid, dass wir Ihnen dabei nicht helfen können. Agent: Ich hoffe Sie können eine Alternative finden. Agent: Sie können das Stoffmuster zum Überziehen der Knöpfe bestellen, wenn das Muster noch verfügbar ist Agent: Dies wäre für ein Muster kostenlos Kunde: Das ist sehr schade, da man leider online keinen Knopf in der farbe und form findet. en: Customer: Dear Gertz GmbH & Co. KG Team, Customer: I bought a velvet green Chou sofa bed from you in December 96929. Customer: Unfortunately, two buttons have been lost there. Customer: Is there a way to get these from you? Agent: Hello Jozef Jacobi Jäckel Agent: I'm very sorry to hear this. Agent: Unfortunately we do not have spare parts such as the buttons available even for sale. Agent: I'm very sorry we're not able to help you with this. Agent: I hope you can find an alternative. Agent: You can always order the fabric sample to cover the buttons if the sample is still available Agent: This would be free of charge for a sample Customer: This is a pity, because unfortunately, you can't find a button in that color and shape online. Customer: Nevertheless, thank you very much. Agent: Did you see my message regarding the fabric sample? Agent: This would resolve some of the issue at no cost Customer: Where can I order this? Agent: If the colour is available to request you can order the sample from a link on the website Customer: Thank you very much, then I will try that. Agent: I wish you luck, I hope you find a solution. Agent: Thank you for taking the time to talk with me today and I hope I have managed to resolve your query, if you wouldn't mind rating our chat today based on my customer service skills I would really appreciate it, the rating button can be found on this chat. Agent: I hope you have a great day and please come back to us if you need any further assistance.

Kunde: Hallo, Kunde: Unter der Bestellnummer 48 habe ich am 29.12.20 die „PRS_ORG, Weiß“ erhalten. Kunde: Sie ist leider doch zu groß und daher muss ich sie wieder zurücksenden. Kunde: Ich habe leider den Retourenschein verlegt. Kunde: Wie gehe ich jetzt vor? Kunde: Vielen Dank und viele Grüße, Kunde: Anneliese Matthäi Agent: Guten Tag Anneliese Matthäi, danke für die Kontaktaufnahme mit Graf Trommler AG. Agent: Darf ich bitte Ihre Rechnungsadresse und E-Mail-Adresse haben, damit ich Ihnen weiterhelfen kann? Kunde: Kambsweg 62
65652 Hannover,  Kunde: haenelalexei@wirth.com Agent: Danke, ich werde das für Sie prüfen. Haben Sie noch die Originalverpackung? Kunde: Ja klar, ist vorhanden. Kunde: Wurde im Prinzip nicht richtig ausgepackt Agent: Vielen Dank! Agent: Die Rücknahmegebühr hierfür ist 10,00 €. Möchten Sie fortfahren? Kunde: Gibt es keine kostenlose Rücksendung bei Ihnen ? Agent: Dies sind die Rücksendekosten mit dem Kurier an uns. Kunde: Und wenn ich eine Graf Trommler AG Retoure selbst zur Post bringe? Kunde: Dafür könnte ich doch von Ihnen einen war Code bekommen oder? Kunde: Oh, „war“=QR Agent: Wir müssten dies über unseren Kurier zurückschicken. Kunde: Ok schade. Kunde: Mache ich dann aber trotzdem. Agent: Ich werde mir jetzt die Rücksendung für Sie ansehen. Kunde: Ok, danke. Agent: Sobald dies wieder in unserem Rücksendelager ist, werden wir die Rückerstattung bearbeiten. Kunde: Ich muss die Sendung aber jetzt trotzdemin einem Graf Trommler AG shop abgeben oder? Agent: Ja, bitte, wenn Sie bereit sind.
en:
Customer: Hello, Customer: Under the order number 48, I received the "PRS_ORG, white" on 29/12/20. Customer: Unfortunately, it is too big after all and therefore I have to send it back again. Customer: Unfortunately, I misplaced the return slip. Customer: How do I proceed now? Customer: Thank you and best regards, Customer: Anneliese Matthäi Agent: Hi Anneliese Matthäi, thanks for contacting Graf Trommler AG Agent: To help me assist you further may I please take your  billing address and email address please? Customer: Kambsweg 62
65652 Hannover, Customer: haenelalexei@wirth.com Agent: Thanks, I will look at this for you, do you have the original packaging still please? Customer: Yes, of course, it is there. Customer: In principle, it was not completely unpacked. Agent: Thanks Agent: The return fee for this is €10.00 would you like to proceed? Customer: Do you not offer free return shipping? Agent: This is the returns fee via the courier to us. Customer: And if I take a Graf Trommler AG return to the post office myself? Customer: Couldn't I get a war code from you for that? Customer: Oh, "war" = QR Agent: We would need this returned via our courier Customer: Ok, too bad. Customer: But I will do it anyway then. Agent: I will look at the return for you now Customer: Ok, thank you. Agent: Once this is back in our returns warehouse we will process the refund Customer: But I have to drop off the shipment in a Graf Trommler AG shop anyway now, right? Agent: Yes please, when you are ready

Kunde: Dabei handelt es sich um Trocknungsrisse, da offenbar nasses/ nicht hinreichend trockenes Holz verarbeitet wurde. Kunde: Derartige Mängel sind nicht hinnehmbar. Kunde: Wie kann sichergestellt werden, dass der neue Schreibtisch nicht wieder dieselben Mängel aufweist, und bei der Verarbeitung hinreichend trockenes Holz verwendet wird/wurde? Kunde: Gab es in letzter Zeit mehrere Reklamationen zu diesem Produkt? Kunde: Visitor uploaded: WSOWDEU3ZL8 Kunde: URL: https://www.kreusel.com/ Kunde: Type: image/jpeg Kunde: Size: 607989 Agent: Guten Morgen Marvin Drewes Agent: Vielen Dank, dass Sie sich mit Bähr in Verbindung gesetzt haben. Sie sprechen mit Marvin Drewes Agent: Ich kann sehen, dass die neue Bestellung für Sie aufgegeben wurde - wir werden alles tun, um Ihre Bestellung in perfektem Zustand zu Ihnen zu bringen Kunde: Welche Maßnahmen werden am Produktionsort getroffen damit deartige Mängel nicht wieder auftreten? Agent: Wir können uns in Ihre Lage hineinversetzen, da Sie auf die Lieferung warten mussten, und wir können Ihnen versichern, dass wir genauso enttäuscht sind wie Sie, da wir versuchen, 100 % der Produkte zu kontrollieren, wenn sie den Hersteller verlassen. Agent: Leider entgehen uns trotz unserer Bemühungen einige Dinge. Agent: Sobald Sie den Artikel erhalten haben, setzen Sie sich bitte mit uns in Verbindung Kunde: An welche Adresse soll der ausgetauschte Tisch retourniert werden? Kunde: Wer instruiert en Zusteller? Kunde: Weiß dieser darüber Bescheid? Kunde: Wie wird eine reibungslose Retoursendung sichergestellt? Agent: Sobald Sie den neuen Artikel erhalten haben, teilen Sie uns dies bitte mit, damit wir die Abholung des fehlerhaften Artikels für Sie vereinbaren können Agent: Sie teilen Sie es uns mit, damit wir die Abholung für Sie einleiten können Kunde: Das soll in einem und gleichzeitig geschehen. Agent: Okay, dann müssen Sie uns mitteilen, wann die Lieferung geplant ist, damit wir dies für Sie einrichten können Kunde: Ich werde mich wieder rechtzeitig mit Ihnen in Verbindung setzen. Agent: Großartig und ja, natürlich können wir das für Sie vereinbaren
en: Customer: Visitor uploaded: WSOWDEU3ZL8 Customer: URL: https://www.kreusel.com/ Customer: Type: image/jpeg Customer: Size: 607989 Customer: Visitor uploaded: WSOWDEU3ZL8 Customer: URL: https://www.kreusel.com/ Customer: Type: image/jpeg Customer: Size: 607989 Customer: Visitor uploaded: WSOWDEU3ZL8 Customer: URL: https://www.kreusel.com/ Customer: Type: image/jpeg Customer: Size: 607989 Customer: Visitor uploaded: WSOWDEU3ZL8 Customer: URL: https://www.kreusel.com/ Customer: Type: image/jpeg Customer: Size: 607989 Customer: Order number 607989 Customer: Desk Bähr -Oak Customer: In addition to the defects already reported at the beginning of Nov. 607989 (scratches in the surface, replacement already arranged, delivery of the new table is to take place on 11/2/21), there are other quality defects such as wood cracks. Customer: These are drying cracks, since apparently wet/not sufficiently dry wood was processed. Customer: Such defects are unacceptable. Customer: How can it be ensured that the new desk does not have the same defects again and that sufficiently dry wood is/has been used during processing? Customer: Have there been multiple complaints about this product lately? Customer: Visitor uploaded: WSOWDEU3ZL8 Customer: URL: https://www.kreusel.com/ Customer: Type: image/jpeg Customer: Size: 607989 Agent: Good Morning Marvin Drewes Agent: Thanks for contacting Bähr, you are through to Marvin Drewes Agent: I can see the new order has been placed for you - we will ensure everything we can to get your order to you in perfect condition Customer: What measures are taken at the production site to ensure that such defects do not occur again? Agent: We do empathise with you, as you’ve had to wait for this to be delivered, and we can assure you that we are as disappointed as you are as we do try and control 100% of the products when they leave the manufacturer. Agent: Unfortunately, things do slip through, despite our best efforts. Agent: Once you have received the item, please be in touch with us Customer: To which address should the exchanged table be returned? Customer: Who instructs the carrier? Customer: Do they know about this? Customer: How will a smooth return shipment be ensured? Agent: Once you have received the new item, please let us know, so we can then arrange the collection of the faulty item for you Agent: You will need to let us know, so we can instigate the collection for you Customer: This is to be done in one and at the same time. Agent: Okay, then you will need to let us know when the delivery is scheduled for, so that we can set this up for you Customer: I will get back in touch with you in time. Agent: Great and then yes, of course, we can arrange this for you

Kunde: In your opinion, how long should I wait for something to happen? Kunde: Diese Ware wurde am 28.9. bestellt und auch bereits bezahlt. en:
Customer: No goods or feedback in this regard Agent: Hi Walfried Radisch B.A., thanks for contacting Fechner GmbH & Co. KG. Agent: To help me assist you further may I please take your order number, billing address and email address please? Customer: Aline-Reinhardt-Gasse 8/0
47838 Neustadtner Waldnaab,  Customer: Order 794367 Agent: Thank you , is it the order for Fechner GmbH & Co. KG, Esche und Glas? Customer: Yes. Agent: This was dispatched from us on the 4th January and is with the courier who will contact you soon to arrange delivery Customer: No, it is not. The goods have already been damaged last week. Customer: By the carrier. Customer: And I still have gotten no feedback. Customer: It does not work this way anymore, I want to cancel this order immediately. Agent: Did  the courier contact you? Customer: I have received an sms for the delivery on 11.1.21 and I have also confirmed this. Customer: Since the delivery has not arrived and I waited in vain I contacted the carrier. Agent: There is no note on the shipment that this is damaged and can see the last movement for shipment was the 14/01 Customer: Today is the 19.01. and I am still waiting for the delivery. Customer: In your opinion, how long should I wait until something happens? Customer: In your opinion, how long should I wait for something to happen? Customer: The goods have been ordered on 28.09. and already paid as well. Customer: In previous chats I was told that someone was going to contact me. Customer: In the previous chats I was always told only it will be who report to me Customer: How can I cancel the order? Customer: This would probably take another 4 months, right? Customer: What will probably last again 4 months or how? Customer: It wouldn't be a problem to wait for the goods if the lady at the carrier company had not said that the article is damaged and that you can hear broken glass in the packaging. Customer: It wouldn't be a problem to wait for the goods if the lady at the forwarding company did not say that the article is damaged or you hear squeezed glass in the packaging Customer: In addition, I find it disgraceful not to keep a confirmed date with a customer and that the customer is not contacted when the delivery can not be made. Customer: And at all I find it absolutely not okay not to meet a confirmed date by the customer and also not to contact the customer that the delivery does not take place Customer: You have the order number, the package is in Wels with Spedition Gebrüder Weiss. Please contact them and ask what is going on. Customer: You have the order number, the goods is in Wels at the Spedition Gebrüder Weiss, please contact this and ask what's going on.

Cornelia Mühle B.Eng., wie kann ich Ihnen heute helfen? Kunde: Ich interessiere mich für den Teppich Gieß KGaA in rosa-gelb. Kunde: kann ich diesen bei Nichtgefallen umtauschen? Cornelia Mühle B.Eng. Kunde: geza21@koehler.com Kunde: Ramona-Seidel-Allee 2/7
13763 Bautzen. Kunde: Ramona-Seidel-Allee 2/7
13763 Bautzen Agent: Vielen Dank, bitte warten Sie einen Moment, während ich Ihre Daten abrufe. Agent: Danke Dipl.-Ing. Cornelia Mühle B.Eng.. Agent: Wenn Sie den Gieß KGaA-Teppich bestellt haben und der Artikel fehlerhaft ist, können Sie diesen Artikel natürlich gegen eine volle Rückerstattung oder einen Ersatzteppich zurücksenden. Kunde: Und wenn die Farbe im Original nicht gefällt, kann ich dann auch umtauschen? Agent: Ja, Sie können es für eine Rückerstattung zurückgeben. Agent: Sie müssten dann eine neue Bestellung für die bevorzugte Wahl aufgeben. Kunde: ich habe den Teppich noch nicht bestellt; ich würde ihn nur bestellen, wenn ich die Möglichkeit habe, ihn auch eventuell umtauschen zu können Agent: Ja, Sie können es ändern, aber Sie müssten den Artikel zurücksenden und eine neue Bestellung in der bevorzugten Farbe aufgeben. Kunde: Ich kann den Teppich bei Nichtgefallen also nicht umtauschen und bekomme das Geld zurück? Agent: Wenn Sie den Teppich nicht mögen, können Sie ihn zurückgeben und wir organisieren eine Rückerstattung. Agent: Wenn die gewünschte Farbe verfügbar ist, müssen Sie eine neue Bestellung aufgeben. Kunde: Es geht nicht um die Farbe, ich habe noch nicht bestellt Agent: Ich weiß, dass Sie noch nicht bestellt haben, aber wenn Sie bestellen und die Farbe nicht mögen, können Sie die Ware für eine Rückerstattung zurücksenden. Kunde: es geht darum, ob ich das Geld zurück erstattet bekomme, wenn der Teppich nicht gefällt wenn er bei mir zuhause ankommt Agent: Wenn Sie die Farbe nicht mögen, können Sie die Ware innerhalb von 30 Tagen für eine Rückerstattung zurücksenden. Agent: Für die Rücksendung von nicht fehlerhaften Artikeln wird eine kleine Rücksendegebühr erhoben.
en:
Customer: Did I get out of the chat? Agent: Hi Dipl.-Ing. Cornelia Mühle B.Eng. Agent: thanks for contacting Gieß KGaA. Agent: You're through to Dipl.-Ing. Cornelia Mühle B.Eng., how can I help you today? Customer: I am interested in the carpet Gieß KGaA in pink-yellow. Customer: Can I exchange this in case of failure? Agent: Can you please confirm your existing order number, plus the full name, postal address and email address on the account? Customer: My name is Dipl.-Ing. Cornelia Mühle B.Eng. Customer: geza21@koehler.com Customer: Ramona-Seidel-Allee 2/7
13763 Bautzen. Customer: Ramona-Seidel-Allee 2/7
13763 Bautzen  Agent: Thank you please allow me a moment to retrieve your details Agent: Thanks Dipl.-Ing. Cornelia Mühle B.Eng.. Agent: If you ordered the Gieß KGaA rug and the item is faulty of course you can return this item for a full refund or a replacement Customer: And if the original color does not like it, can I change it? Agent: Yes you will be able to return for a refund. Agent: You would then need to place a new order for a preferred option. Customer: I have not ordered the carpet yet; I would only order it if I have the opportunity to change it as well. Agent: Yes you can change it but you would need to return the item and place a new order for a preferred colour. Customer: So I can't change the carpet if I don't like it and get the money back? Agent: If you don't like the rug you can return it and we will organise a refund. Agent: If there is a preferred colour you will then need to place a new order . Customer: It's not about the color, I haven't ordered yet. Agent: I know you haven't ordered yet but if you order and you don't like the colour you can return for a refund Customer: It's about whether I get the money back if I don't like the carpet when it arrives at my home. Agent: If you don't like the colour you can return within 30 days for a refund. Agent: There is a small returns charge for the return of non faulty item.

95005 Schrobenhausen; the e-mail is ieigenwillig@beier.com Customer: On 5/1 we had already received a message that the order has left the warehouse. Customer: Since then, however, we haven't heard anything from the delivery partner. Customer: Upon request, we were told there yesterday that the item has not even been handed over yet. Agent: Yes we have dispatched your bed on the 5th January. Agent: Could you confirm your phone number? Agent: I will make sure Bärer e.V. has the correct contact details for you Customer: 07336 434514 Customer: We were informed that the item has not even been handed over to Bärer e.V. Customer: In the meantime, more than 2 weeks have passed and it is currently not foreseeable that the bed will arrive in the next few days. Customer: We understand that there are delays due to the current situation, but this is now a fairly large delay. Agent: I completely understand your frustration. Agent: What I can do is email Bärer e.V. and update you via email as soon as they have confirmed the location of the parcel. Customer: We have now contacted Bärer e.V.Bärer e.V.) ourselves in the meantime, and we were told that the item has not even been handed over yet. Customer: How can that be? Customer: For us, it would be important now to know when we can expect the delivery. Customer: Will it take a few days or still several weeks? Agent: I am sorry, I will have to get Bärer e.V. to confirm the items lost before I can look into arranging the replacement or refund. Agent: It may be that they aren't scanned into the warehouse yet. Agent: I am sorry I can update you via email as soon as I have more information. Agent: I understand, I will update you of that as soon as I know but I need an update from Bärer e.V. before I can give an accurate date. Customer: Okay, all right. Customer: Then I will be waiting for your update by e-mail. Customer: Thank you! Agent: Yes as soon as I have the information, I shall email you.

Cindy Klotz shoe cabinet Agent: No problem, can I please ask the reason for returning? Agent: Thanks Customer: This item is damaged and I can send the photo to you. Agent: I've raised the refund request, I am just organising the Scheibe collection. Agent: That's been organised for  you Scheibe. Agent: Once your items have been scanned back into our warehouse please allow 5-7 working days for a debit card refund and 2-30 working days for a credit card refund, depending on your bank/credit card company. Customer: Order number 8327 Customer: Under this number, there is only one item. Agent: I can see that - the Scheibe, Kupfer - I am just checking our warehouse system for you now Agent: It hasn't arrived into our warehouse yet but i can see it's at the top of our warehouse system list so they are expecting it from Scheibe. Kunde: Sehr geehrte Damen und Herren, Kunde: Ich habe das Berger Gude AG Sideboard im Spät Frühling 519 bestellt und wurde nun wieder über eine Verzögerung der Lieferung benachrichtigt. Kunde: Ich benötige die Kommode aber jetzt und hatte mich auf den 15.01.519 eingestellt, um nun zu sehen dass sich die Lieferung wieder verzögert? Kunde: Können Sie mir bitte zeitnah die Kommode zustellen und zumindest eine Priorisierung der bereits getätigten Bestellungen vornehmen und diese als erstes bearbeiten Kunde: Wenn ich as Sideboard jetzt bestellen würde, steht als Versand 8-10 Wochen dort. Kunde: Ich warte seit fast EINEM Jahr auf das Sideboard. Kunde: Pandemie hin oder her, es kann doch nicht sein, dass man ein Produkt fast ein Jahr später erst geliefert bekommt Kunde: Ich komme mir als Kunde sehr veräppelt vor Agent: Guten Morgen, Agent: vielen Dank, dass Sie sich mit Berger Gude AG in Verbindung gesetzt haben. Ich bin Kreszentia Roht. Agent: Damit ich Ihnen weiterhelfen kann, geben Sie bitte Ihre Kontodaten an (vollständiger Name, E-Mail-Adresse, Postanschrift und Bestellnummer). Kunde: Kreszentia Roht Kunde: rosenowralf-dieter@nohlmans.com Kunde: Grein Grothplatz 61
55725 Rockenhausen, Kunde: +49(0)8928948632 Agent: Vielen Dank! Bitte warten Sie einen Moment. Agent: Geht es um das Berger Gude AG Sideboard, Zartrosa und Messing? Kunde: Genau Agent: Vielen Dank! Agent: Leider hat sich Ihre Bestellung verzögert, während der Versand an uns vom Hersteller erfolgt ist, weshalb sich Ihr Versanddatum geändert hat. Agent: Das voraussichtliche Versanddatum ist jetzt der 1. Februar 2021. Agent: Es gibt derzeit viel Druck auf den globalen Versand auf der ganzen Welt. Agent: Infolgedessen dauert es länger, bis unsere Produkte ankommen. Agent: Dies bedeutet leider, dass sich Ihr Versanddatum erneut ändern kann oder Ihre Bestellung noch später geliefert werden kann. Agent: Ich verstehe die Enttäuschung darüber, aber seien Sie versichert, dass wir alles tun, um Ihre Bestellung so schnell wie möglich an Sie zu senden. Agent: Wenn Sie die Bestellung noch erhalten möchten, bitten wir Sie, sich wieder mit uns in Verbindung zu setzen, sobald sie geliefert wurde, damit wir den gesamten Verzögerungszeitraum und Ihre Kundenerfahrung insgesamt überprüfen können. Agent: Wenn die Lieferung mehr als 14 Tage später erfolgte, werden wir Ihnen gerne eine Entschädigung anbieten, um uns für die Verzögerung zu entschuldigen. Agent: Wenn Sie es natürlich vorziehen, nicht länger zu warten, können Sie Ihre Bestellung jederzeit für eine volle Rückerstattung vor der Lieferung stornieren. Agent: Sie haben den Artikel im August bestellt. Kunde: Ursprünglich war das Lieferdatum der 31.12.519 Kunde: Wurde dann schon um 15 Tage nach hinten geschoben auf den 15.01.519 Agent: Ja, leider hat sich die Bestellung um 519 Tage verzögert. Das tut mir sehr leid. Kunde: Und nun wieder verschoben? Kunde: Ohne Gutschein etc.. Kunde: Es wird einfach ausgegangen, dass man als Kunde geduldig wartet und wartet und wartet Agent: Leider kann ich die Bestellung nicht früher liefern. Kunde: Naja, schade. Kunde: Vielen Dank. Kunde: Ich weiß dass Sie nichts dafür können. Kunde: Dennoch sehr ärgerlich Agent: Ich verstehe das und ich hoffe, Sie erhalten den Artikel bald. Agent: Ich wünsche ihnen einen wunderbaren Tag!
en:
Customer: Dear Ladies and Gentlemen, Customer: I ordered the Berger Gude AG Sideboard in late spring 519 and was now notified of a delay in delivery. Customer: But I need the chest of drawers now and had set myself to 15.01.519 to see that the delivery is delayed again? Customer: Can you please send me the chest of drawers promptly and at least prioritize the orders already made and process them first? Customer: If I ordered a sideboard now, it will be shipped for 8-10 weeks. Customer: I've been waiting for the sideboard for almost one year. Customer: Pandemic back or forth, it can't be that you get a product delivered almost a year later. Customer: As a customer, I feel very deceived. Agent: Good Morning Agent: Thanks for contacting Berger Gude AG, you are through to Kreszentia Roht Agent: So that I can assist you can you please provide your account details (Full Name, E-mail address, Postal Address and Order Number) Customer: Kreszentia Roht Customer: rosenowralf-dieter@nohlmans.com Customer: Grein Grothplatz 61
55725 Rockenhausen,  Customer: +49(0)8928948632 Agent: Thank you - one moment Agent: So the Berger Gude AG Sideboard, Zartrosa und Messing? Customer: Exactly... Agent: Thank you. Agent: Regrettably your order has been delayed whilst shipping to us from the manufacturer which is why your dispatch date has changed. Agent: The expected dispatch is now showing as 01-Feb-2021. Agent: There’s currently a lot of pressure on global shipping around the world. Agent: As a result, our products are taking longer to arrive into ports. Agent: This does unfortunately mean that your dispatch date may change again, or your order could be delayed further. Agent: I understand that this will be disappointing, but please rest assured that we are doing all we can to get your order to you as quickly as possible. Agent: If you are happy to continue with the order, we ask that you get back in touch once it has been delivered so we can review the full delay and your customer journey as a whole. Agent: If the delay remains at over 14 days we will happily offer a good will gesture to apologise for the delay. Agent: Of course, if you would prefer to not wait any longer, you can cancel your order for a full refund at any time before delivery Agent: You ordered the item in August Customer: Originally, the delivery date was 31.12.519 Customer: Was then already pushed back by 15 days to the 15.01.519 Agent: Yes, regrettably the order has been delayed by 519 days - I am very sorry for this Customer: And now postponed again? Customer: Without coupon etc.. Customer: It is simply assumed that one as a customer waits patiently and waits and waits patiently. Agent: Regrettably, I cannot expedite the order sooner Customer: Well, too bad. Customer: Thank you very much. Customer: I know you can't do anything for that. Customer: Still very annoying. Agent: I understand, I hope you receive the item soon Agent: Have a great day

Customer: Visitor uploaded: QLUGDEM38T6 Customer: URL: https://kruschwitz.com/ Customer: Type: image/png Customer: Size: 3392666 Customer: Dear Scholtz AG & Co. KG Team, Customer: I got the sofa delivered today. Customer: Contrary to the information on the order confirmation, the sofa was delivered only to the front door and not to the room of my choice. Customer: This is extremely annoying, because I can hardly carry the sofa up to the second floor by myself. Customer: I am very disappointed with this approach, because that was the reason I ordered from Scholtz AG & Co. KG. Customer: From my point of view, three options remain: Customer: 1 Customer: You will refund me a price discount, so that I can hire someone to put the sofa in the desired place and dispose of the trash Customer: 2 Customer: I hire someone to do the above work and charge you for it Customer: 3 Customer: You pick up the sofa again Customer: Please contact me as soon as possible with regard to this. Customer: Enclosed please find the order confirmation with the corresponding delivery information. Customer: Best regards, Univ.Prof. Sibylla Schmidtke B.Eng. 48809 Leipziger Land, Customer: Ringweg 590
48809 Leipziger Land Agent: Thank you Agent: One moment please Agent: Due to the current lockdown restrictions - Scholtz AG & Co. KG deliveries will be delivered to the apartment door. Agent: Room of choice is not possible, customers premises will not be entered. Agent: Removal of packaging material is also not possible due to lockdown restrictions. Customer: I was not specifically informed about this and still won't be able to get the sofa to the second  Customer: floor (room of my choice) now. Customer: I have to hire someone for this. Customer: Otherwise, I can't get the sofa out of my entrance area. Customer: And as I said, that was one of the reasons why I ordered from Scholtz AG & Co. KG. Agent: I understand, at the time of placing you order the restrictions were relaxed, but since the pandemic has got worse these are the delivery procedures now Customer: However, I didn't get any information about this, otherwise I could have reacted to it. Customer: What should I do now with the sofa that is in the entrance? Agent: The courier will normally let you know when they arrange the delivery with you Customer: He didn't say anything. Customer: Moreover, the delivery man was extremely unfriendly today. Agent: I am very sorry to hear that, I cannot change the couriers procedures during the pandemic, I do apologise Customer: Either you give me a discount due to the additional costs (transport and waste disposal), or I will check if I withdraw from the purchase contract. Customer: I'm sorry, but transportation to the right room is extremely important to me. Agent: I can refund the 60€ shipping cost to you  as a gesture of goodwill? Customer: Ok, that's fine. Customer: With this I can hire someone for the transport. Agent: I will request this with the finance department and email you by the end of the day, is that ok? Customer: Ok, thank you. Customer: And thank you very much for your support! Agent: Please note, all our delivery details are on the website for future reference, so no nasty surprises ! Agent: No problem Agent: Is there anything else I can help with?

Agent: Es ist nicht ungewöhnlich, dass diese während des gesamten Prozesses schwanken. en: Customer: Hello: Is it true that the delivery 379533 will take a whole 14 - 16 weeks? Agent: Good morning Holger Rudolph B.Sc. Customer: Good morning Holger Rudolph B.Sc. Agent: If this is the information which shows on your order confirmation, then this will be the most accurate information we can provide Agent: The dispatch times provided for each item on the website indicate how far through the manufacturing and shipping process the item is. Agent: The longer dispatch times mean the item is likely still in the manufacturing phase, whereas shorter dispatch times mean the item is almost with us; this is why they will be ready to dispatch sooner. Agent: I regret this means we are not able to expedite orders. Customer: This is no problem for me as long as the shipping times are adhered to. Customer: Can I assume that these 3 - 4 months are realistic, or is there a great probability that it will be later? Agent: It can fluctuate either way. Agent: Any updates we receive which apply to the supply chain of your item, will show in an updated dispatch estimate. Agent: It is not unusual for these to fluctuate throughout the process. Agent: Due to the unpredictability of the port congestion globally, some items have been delayed, but some are also being dispatched to customers sooner Agent: If we can get your order into our warehouse sooner, it will begin preparing for dispatch immediately and you will be notified by email Agent: You can check the progress of your order (the date of dispatch from our warehouse to the courier) through your 'my account' and 'my orders'. Agent: If you have not set up an account and a pass word then please enter the email address used to place the order and use the 'forgotten password?' Agent: option to gain access to this information. Customer: Perfect. Agent: Is there anything else I can help with? Customer: That's all. Customer: I am happy with the information. Agent: If there are any delays, or you change your mind then cancellation is free of charge until the item is preparing to dispatch Agent: So in this case, just let us know if you wish to cancel Agent: If there is nothing else I can help with, then thank you for taking the time to talk with me today and I hope I have managed to resolve your query, if you wouldn't mind rating our chat today based on my customer service skills I would really appreciate it, the rating button can be found on this chat. Agent: I hope you have a great day and please come back to us if you need any further assistance.

Agent: Es tut mir sehr leid. Agent: Wir behalten keine Rückläufer. Agent: Es wird wie bei jeder Rücksendung zurückgegeben, daher wird das Lager es wie bei jeder Rücksendung bearbeiten. en:
Customer: Hello dear Prof. Michaela Tintzmann, An order of mine 311145131, could unfortunately not be delivered last week and was sent back to you again. Customer: Is there any way that the lamp can be sent again or included in my next delivery? Customer: Thank you very much in advance! Customer: :-) Agent: Good Morning Prof. Michaela Tintzmann Agent: Thanks for contacting Ring GmbH & Co. KG, you are through to Prof. Michaela Tintzmann. Agent: So that I can assist you can you please provide your account details (Full Name, E-mail address, Postal Address) Customer: Valentina-Hövel-Straße 79
03403 Bad Freienwalde, karl-heinz94@schomber.com Agent: thanks Agent: I'm really sorry the returned item will have been treated as with any return and is now unavailable to redispatch Agent: I can refund this lamp for you Customer: So would I have to order the lamp again? Agent: Sometimes we can reorder which is usually easier, but on this occasion there is no stock left for this item now Agent: I'm really sorry Agent: I will pass the refund request to finance, and we will get this processed today Customer: But the lamp should arrive back to you only now. Customer: So at least this one lamp would still have to be in stock. Agent: It was returned a few days ado, so if it was damaged in any way it would be discarded, and if it was pristine, it would have been re-advertised as good stock Agent: This is the usual procedure Agent: I am very sorry. Agent: We do not hold return stock. Agent: It is returned as with any return, so the warehouse will process it as with any return Customer: I honestly do not understand exactly what you want to tell me. Customer: But the final result is probably the same. Customer: Then please send me the money for the lamp back. Agent: I am very sorry. Agent: I wish we had a replacement we could send, but we do not Agent: I know this is disappointing Agent: We will refund today Agent: Is there anything else I can help with? Customer: Do you know if you will have the Ring GmbH & Co. KG bedside table in gray and copper in stock again? Customer: Currently it is sold out. Agent: one minute please Agent: I am just checking Customer: Thank you. Agent: we expect more of these around May/June. Agent: These will show on the website in the next few weeks I would think Customer: Okay, thank you. :-) Agent: you're very welcome Agent: Did you have any other questions? Agent: Thank you for taking the time to talk with me today and I hope I have managed to resolve your query, if you wouldn't mind rating our chat today based on my customer service skills I would really appreciate it, the rating button can be found on this chat. Agent: I hope you have a great day and please come back to us if you need any further assistance.

de: Kunde: Hi, ich hatte ein Problem mit der Bestellung und Sie wollten sich bei mir melden, was Sie noch nicht gemacht haben. Agent: Guten Tag Janusz Mans, Agent: vielen Dank für Ihre Kontaktaufnahme mit Rudolph. Agent: Können Sie bitte Ihre Bestellnummer sowie den vollständigen Namen, die Postanschrift und die E-Mail-Adresse des Kontos bestätigen? Agent: Vielen Dank! Kunde: Auf diese Email: annelies24@kobelt.org wurden Sachen bestellt. Kunde: Anscheinend ist die Bestellung nicht durchgegangen weil es Probleme mit der Bank gab und wir haben auch keine Bestätigung bekommen Kunde: Deswegen habe ich keine Bestellnummer Kunde: Ein Item ist aber schon bei uns angekommne Agent: Danke Janusz Mans, bitte warten Sie einen Moment, während ich Ihre Bestelldaten abfrage. Kunde: Wir haben bestellt: 1 Rudolph Bett, 1 Kommode, 2 Lampen und 1 Rudolph Betteil (dieses ist schon angekommen) Agent: Ich kann sehen, dass die Bestellung unter der Bestellnummer 1692 am 16. Januar mit 6 Artikeln aufgegeben wurde. Agent: Welche Artikel haben Sie erhalten? Agent: Entschuldigung, ich kann jetzt siehe oben sehen. Kunde: Genau! Kunde: Wir haben das Rudolph Betteil bekommen. Kunde: Den Rest noch nicht. Kunde: Also ist die Bestellung durchgegangen? Kunde: Könnten Sie mir dann bitte eine Bestätigungsmail schicken? Agent: Dies ist sehr seltsam, da die Bestellung zweimal aufgegeben und beide Male von der Bank storniert wurde. Agent: Ich muss nur einen Kollegen konsultieren, einen Moment bitte. Agent: Es tut mir sehr leid, aber da Sie bei dieser Bestellung nicht der genannte Kontoinhaber sind, können wir die Bestellung nicht mit Ihnen besprechen. Agent: Wäre es möglich, dass der genannte Kontoinhaber eine E-Mail an annelies24@kobelt.org sendet und die Erlaubnis gibt, mit Ihnen zu sprechen? Kunde: Der Kontoinhaber von der Bank oder von der Rudolph bestellung? Kunde: Das sind meine Mutter und meine Schwester Kunde: Die beide gerade arbeiten Agent: Des Rudolph-Bestellkontos. Agent: Ich verstehe und weiß, dass es frustrierend ist, aber wir müssen das allgemeine Datenschutzrecht einhalten Agent: Wenn sie heute Abend eine E-Mail an annelies24@kobelt.org senden können, die uns die Erlaubnis gibt, mit Ihnen zu sprechen, können wir diese Angelegenheit für Sie weiter untersuchen. Agent: Alternativ kann ich dem Kontoinhaber jetzt eine E-Mail senden und er kann auf meine E-Mail antworten und Sie auch in der E-Mail kopieren? Kunde: ja bitte senden Sie eine Mail an annelies24@kobelt.org Kunde: Sie sollte Ihnen jetzt eine Mail geschickt haben Agent: Noch ist nichts eingetroffen. Agent: Ich werde ihr eine E-Mail senden, bitte warten Sie einen Moment. Kunde: Sie meinte gerade, dass Sie die Mail geschickt hat und auch eine Antwort erhalten hat Kunde: *eine automatische Antwort Agent: Ich habe es! Agent: Vielen Dank, ich werde jetzt einen Kollegen konsultieren, warum die Bestellung versandt wurde. Agent: Einen Moment bitte. Kunde: Ja danke. Kunde: Und vor allem auch wie wir jetzt verfahren sollen? Kunde: Was mich interessiert ist ob jetzt alle Artikel losgeschickt wurden? Agent: Es ist das erste Mal, dass ich das je gesehen habe. Agent: Ich warte nur auf eine Antwort. Agent: Vielen Dank für Ihre Geduld.
en: Customer: Hello, I had a problem with the order and you wanted to get in touch with me, which you haven't done yet. Agent: Hi Janusz Mans Agent: Thanks for contacting Rudolph. Agent: Can  you please confirm your order number, plus the full name, postal address and email address on the account? Agent: thanks Customer: On this email: annelies24@kobelt.org things were ordered. Customer: Apparently, the order did not go through because there were problems with the bank and we also did not receive any confirmation. Customer: That's why I don't have an order number. Customer: But we have already received an item. Agent: Thanks Janusz Mans, please allow me a moment to retrieve your order details Customer: We ordered: 1 Rudolph bed, 1 dresser, 2 lamps and 1 Rudolph bed part (this has already arrived). Agent: I can see Order number 1692  was placed on January 16 containing six items. Agent: Which items have you received? Agent: Sorry i can now see above. Customer: Exactly! Customer: We got the Rudolph bed part. Customer: The rest not yet. Customer: So did the order go through? Customer: Could you then send me a confirmation email please? Agent: This is very strange as the order was placed twice and both times it was cancelled by the bank. Agent: I will just need to consult a colleague, one moment please Agent: I'm very sorry but as you are not the named account holder on this order we aren't legally allowed to discuss the order with you. Agent: Would it be possible for the named account holder to email annelies24@kobelt.org and provide permission to speak with you? Customer: The account holder from the bank or of the Rudolph order? Customer: These are my mother and my sister. Customer: Both of them are currently working. Agent: Of the Rudolph order account. Agent: I understand and I know it's frustrating but we have to comply with the General Data Protection law Agent: If they can email annelies24@kobelt.org this evening providing permission for us to speak with you we can then look into this matter further for you Agent: Alternatively I can email the account holder now and they can respond to my email and copy you also on the email? Customer: Yes, please send an email to annelies24@kobelt.org. Customer: She should have sent you an email now. Agent: Nothing has arrived yet. Agent: I will just send her an email, one moment please. Customer: She just said that she sent the email and also received a response. Customer: *an automatic response Agent: I have it! Agent: Thank you very much, i will now consult a colleague on why the order has been dispatched. Agent: One moment please Customer: Yes, thank you. Customer: And, above all, how we should proceed now? Customer: What interests me is whether all items have now been sent out. Agent: It is the first time I have ever seen this happen. Agent: I am just waiting for a response. Agent: Thanks for your patience

Wenn es Ihnen nichts ausmachen würde, unseren heutigen Chat auf der Grundlage meiner Kundendienstfähigkeiten zu bewerten, wäre ich Ihnen sehr dankbar. Agent: Ich wünsche Ihnen einen schönen Tag und bitte Sie, sich an uns zu wenden, wenn Sie weitere Hilfe benötigen sollten.
en: Customer: Hello, Customer: Order number: 39621 Customer: We deliberately ordered this desk in this color from you, because it was indicated with a delivery time of 10-12 weeks (shipping date: 15.02.21). Customer: Now I see - by chance - that the shipping date has been changed to 19.03.21 (with no message from you!) Customer: and that the price was reduced by 70€. Customer: This is a little disappointing (especially the lack of messages by you). Customer: Best regards, Theobald Blümel  Agent: Good Morning Theobald Blümel Agent: Thanks for contacting Schleich, you are through to Theobald Blümel. Agent: I'm very sorry to hear your order is delayed. Agent: I can certainly look at the sale price for this item as well. Agent: So that I can assist you can you please provide your account details (Full Name, E-mail address, Postal Address) Customer: Theobald Blümel Customer: martenplath@paffrath.org Customer: 39621 Agent: thank you Agent: a few minutes please Customer: Ok. Agent: I can refund the 39621 eur difference in price for you today Agent: With regards to the delay on the order, I would advise that this may still change and if we can get your desk in to our warehouse any sooner we will do Agent: If this is dispatched later than 26th February, then you may be entitled to some form of compensation. Agent: If this is the case, we would ask that once you have received your desk and can confirm you are 100% happy with the item, then please be back in touch so we can look into whta we can offer Customer: Ok for the refund. Agent: Please keep an eye on your tracking page Agent: Is there anything else I can help with today? Customer: No, it was for today. Agent: *correct Customer: Thank you and a nice day Agent: Thank you for taking the time to talk with me today and I hope I have managed to resolve your query, if you wouldn't mind rating our chat today based on my customer service skills I would really appreciate it, the rating button can be found on this chat. Agent: I hope you have a great day and please come back to us if you need any further assistance.

en:

Agent: Thank you for waiting Mira Patberg, I am going to raise this with the couriers to request an update on your delivery. Agent: The order is with Staude Aumann KGaA, once we find out what has happened, hopefully they should be able to arrange the delivery to you as soon as possible. Customer: You have seen when I ordered and paid? Customer: That was a long long time ago! Customer: The goods have also been with Staude Aumann KGaA since December! Agent: I fully understand your frustration with this and I can not apologise enough. Agent: As soon as I find out what has happened and why the delivery has not taken place yet we can then get this sorted for you. Customer: Sorted? Customer: What does this mean? Agent: Sorry, sobald wir herausfinden können, was mit Staude Aumann KGaA passiert ist, können wir das für Sie in Ordnung bringen. Customer: OK. Customer: Then I will keep waiting now. Agent: Is there anything else I can help you with today please? Customer: Will you contact me by e-mail? Agent: Yes, I will email you directly once I have a response from Staude Aumann KGaA. Agent: I'm going to end the chat now but just click the button if you have any other queries. Agent: You will shortly be receiving an email to rate our chat today. Agent: If you have a moment may I ask that you do fill this in please or alternatively thank you again and have a wonderful day.
